General.Name: Orkla ASA
General.Description: Orkla ASA operates primarily in the branded consumer goods, renewable energy, real estate, aluminum solutions, and financial investment businesses. The company produces and sells a range of branded consumer goods and concept solutions primarily to grocery, out-of-home, and bakery sectors in the Nordic region, Baltics, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Austria, and India. It offers detergents and personal care products, hygiene and cleaning solutions, painting tools, dietary supplements, and health products, as well as basic textiles; snacks and confectionery products, and biscuits; and food ingredients, such as margarine and butter blends, yeast, bread and cake improvers and mixes, marzipan, and ice cream ingredients. The company also produces and supplies hydro power to the Nordic power market; develops and sells real estate properties; and manufactures aluminum solutions, as well as paints and powder coatings. Orkla ASA is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
